roleset.name: make more up-to-date

roles.note: arg0 not very likely with adjectival 'modern'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: At the same time, steelmakers-1 are trying *trace*-1 to invest more *trace*-1 to modernize technology and make themselves more competitive.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'modernize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'modern' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4

example.name: adejctival rel: modern
example.text: It apeas Noth Korea has started enriching uranium at a brand new plant that-1 [*-1] apparently is very modern .
